segments.text: Hello , Sir . What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to find a new way of getting my insurance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We've just started a new business at this bank , Bank-Insurance Link .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you give me some details about that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . It could really benefit someone like you . Besides insurance for you , you can also get more or less dividends from the insurance company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great . More dividends if I want to purchase them !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are two different types that we are offering at the moment , Dividend Deposit and Dividend Participated Deposit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll go through the materials that you have given me and return shortly . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S2
